value.title: Exploring the Visio visual in Power BI
value.excerpt: Want to explore locations with data? The Visio visual in Power BI helps you do just that! Patrick looks at how to set it up and help use your data to highlight areas within a Visio diagram.  Download Sample: https://guyinacu.be/visiosample  Documentation: https://support.microsoft.com/office/add-visio-visuals-to-power-bi-reports-4f09be62-f436-45c2-93b0-4a0f66b1f5a7

value.title: Flexibility with Days Since calculations in Power BI
value.excerpt: Calculating Days since a given date in DAX is pretty straight forward. But, what if you want flexibility with different dates in your model? Patrick shows you how to do that with Power BI.  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************  Want to take your Power BI skills

value.title: INSANE AMAZING updates for the Power BI Embedded Playground (2021)

Then you need to check out the INSANE AMAZING updates for the Power BI Embedded Playground! Amit Shuster walks us through the revamp. value.title: OData Differences within Power BI and how to refresh your data!
value.excerpt: Last week we looked at the O365 Bubble and how we use Authentication to go in and out.  This week we show it in action!  We will look at one of the limitations to the existing Power BI service and how we can actually use the new Power BI Preview service to refresh data from an OData feed using oAuth
